thread.section_title: BikeTiresDirect.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BikeTiresDirect.com | biketiresdirect.com
thread.title: John Martinko

author: John Martinko
title: John Martinko
text: I ordered 2 tires, but only one was in stock. Because the original order was over $50, the shipping was supposed to be free. Free shipping is a big deal when I look for on-line stuff. You charged me for shipping on the single tire since it was only $35. Seems unfair when I ordered 2. To me this was your problem, not mine. Shipping should have been free. My query concerning this was answered with the $50 free shipping rule.
